channel.title: How do i get the writing under my name tht say stuff like proud owner of
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]Please can someone tell me how to get that writing under my name that says stuff like Proud owner of....[/glow]
[size=20pt][glow=red,2,300]PLEASE HELP![/glow][/size][br][size=1]Posted at: October 19, 2006, 01:01:47 PM[/size][hr][size=50pt]please help!![/size][br][size=1]Posted at: October 19, 2006, 01:02:43 PM[/size][hr][size=50pt][glow=red,2,300]why does everyone read my posts and not help?!?!?!?!?!?!? plz help[/glow][/size]
